title: The access door/s from the enclosed staircase/s to the terrace floor shall have louvers at top half portion of the door
clause_text: The access door/s from the enclosed staircase/s to the terrace floor shall have louvers at top half portion of the door. The entrance doors to the terrace shall be painted or fixed with sign painted in luminous paint mentioning "REFUGE AREA‚Äù
section: Terrace floor as a refuge floor: -
